name: Mario's Cement Factory (Itizso)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.7.1 Details Title Mario's Cement Factory Model No. ML-102 Series Game & Watch ( New Wide Screen ) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date June 8, 1983 Screen Liquid Crystal Display ( LCD ) Chipset Sharp SM510 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

In this new wide screen edition of Nintendo's Game & Watch series of handheld LCD games our favorite plumber finds himself working in a cement factory where he must load concrete into waiting trucks by operating a series of concrete mixers.

Gameplay

Mario is working in a cement factory where concrete is being fed into a series of four mixers located across two levels.

Three loads of concrete will fill a mixer. Any more, and the concrete spills over on to the truck driver below. Mario will have to open the valves on the mixers to release the concrete before the mixers fill up.

To reach the mixers Mario will have to hop on and off platforms moving between the two levels while being careful not to fall off.

Trivia

This new wide screen edition of Mario's Cement Factory is a re-release of the earlier Tabletop edition with only a few minor differences in gameplay but in a more affordable handheld format.
